meanings.definition: A person who practices or advocates expressionism.
meanings.sent1: The art gallery featured a famous expressionists' work.
meanings.sent2: Many expressionists use bold colors and abstract shapes in their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The expressionists' paintbrushes seemed to dance on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a window into the soul of the expressionists.
meanings.sent5: The passion of the expressionists shone through every stroke of the brush.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of artists who sought to express their emotions and subjective experiences through their art.
meanings.sent1: The expressionists' paintings often evoke strong feelings in viewers.
meanings.sent2: She studied the works of famous expressionists in art class.
meanings.sent3: The expressionists' studio was always filled with vibrant colors and creative energy.
meanings.sent4: His art collection included pieces by renowned expressionists from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The expressionists' exhibition left a lasting impact on the art world.
